peregrine.io.sstable
Interface SSTableReader

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Closeable, SequenceReader
All Known Implementing Classes:
LocalPartitionReader, Memtable
public interface SSTableReader
extends SequenceReader

Interface for describing an SSTable. Both the memtable and disk tables have to implement this interface.

Method Detail

seekTo

boolean seekTo(java.util.List<BackendRequest> requests,
               RecordListener listener)
               throws java.io.IOException

Seek to a given key (or keys) by using the SSTable index. For disk based indexes we use the meta block information. For Memtable we can just seek directly to the key in memory and read it from the internal memory index.

The key() and value() method, when we match, must return the last key we found via seekTo().

Throws:
java.io.IOException
